regulator_name: New Jersey Division of Gaming Enforcement (DGE)
notes: NJ publishes Internet Gaming Permit Holders (permit holders, not necessarily every brand/skin).
PGCB provides an official interactive gaming operators page for verifying regulated sites.
MGCB's consumer page lists licensed internet gaming operators and guidance on legal vs illegal gaming.
WV Lottery publishes iGaming license lists (PDFs); this project records operators from the public license list.

regulator_name: Connecticut Department of Consumer Protection (Gaming Division)
notes: CT states there are two legal iCasino platforms: DraftKings/Foxwoods and FanDuel/Mohegan Sun (per DCP).
Delaware Lottery iGaming page points to the state's authorized casino platforms.
